content: increase single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat 3x 21 sts rnd7 in flo increase single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 7x 28 sts chain 1 turn rnd8 increase single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat 6x increase single_crochet in next single_crochet do not finish round 33 sts chain 1 turn rnd9 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet do not finish round ifo applejack mane and tail make one of each with yellow chain 21 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 19 chain 20 sts repeat 5x makes 5 connected locks fo with tail for sewing with red yarn tie loose ends of locks together about 1/2 inch from ends for mane with needle and yellow tail yarn sew untied end between ears on head for tail roll connected row ends together in a tight spiral with wrong side of stitches on outside of roll with needle and yellow tail yarn secure spiral with 4-5 stitches sew spiraled end of tail to back end of body applejack forelock fc chain 9 r1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet 8 sts chain 1 turn r3 in flo single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet 7 sts chain 3 turn r3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain single_crochet in blo of next 7 single_crochet 9 sts chain 1 turn r4 in flo single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 8 sts chain 3 turn r5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain single_crochet in blo of next 8 single_crochet 10 sts fo with tail for sewing to head sew forelock to head between ears pony crochet pattern janageek on ravelry com 16 31 06/09/20 page 4 of 8 rarity horn rnd1 with white chain 2 single_crochet 4 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 4 in ml 4 sts rnd2-5 4 rounds
